duties_responsibilities.duty: Automatically locate and process ID documents in an image or video stream.
Train and test the algorithm for Digital On-Boarding Services (DOBS) using recorded photos and videos of ID documents.
Record photos and videos of ID documents in different locations and lighting to improve document detection in different environments.
Complete 10 sessions of recording, with 1 photo and 1 video per session.
Pass quality checks for images and videos to receive a fixed payment.
Provide access to a smartphone device and a valid driving license or ID card document for participation.
